excerpt.rendered:
2019: A Macallan Exceptional Single Cask with a new look in 2019. Donning the new bottle design, this is a 22 year old vintage 1997 from one european oak sherry butt. Bottled at 57.60% abv, this will be a lovely drop to savour.

ESC 2019/ESB-5542/02
Cask Type: European Oak Sherry Butt
Distilled: 16 April 1997
Bottled: 2 August 2019
One of 581 bottles

Cask number #5542

Distillery : Macallan
Age : 22
Vintage : 1997
ABV : 57.60%
